data.title: Musical Film Flora and Son Sets Soundtrack Release Date
data.meta_description: The film is the latest from Once and Sing Street director John Carney. Listen to songs from the film below.
data.text:
Flora and Son, the newest musical film from Once and Sing Street director John Carney, will release its original motion picture soundtrack September 15. Produced by Gary Clark (Sing Street), the soundtrack features songs performed by songwriter Clark and the film's stars, Eve Hewson, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and Orén Kinlan. The film has released two tracks from the film. Listen to “Meet In The Middle,” featuring Gordon-Levitt and Hewson, above.

Written and directed by Carney, the Apple Original Film will be released in theatres September 22 ahead of its global premiere on Apple TV+ September 29. Additional music is by Clark and Carney.

Flora and Son centers on single mom Flora (Hewson), who is at a loss about what to do with her rebellious teenage son, Max (Kinlan). Encouraged by the police to find Max a hobby, Flora tries to occupy him with a beat-up acoustic guitar. With the help of a washed-up L.A. musician (Gordon-Levitt), Flora and Max discover the transformative power of music, exploring the bond between a mother and son on a journey toward a new harmony. Listen to “High Life,” featuring Hewson and Kinlan below.

Take a peek at the album's track list below.

1. Guitar Repair – Gary Clark

2. I Hope That I Don’t Fall in Love with You - Joseph Gordon-Levitt

3. Abra Da Cabra - Gary Clark

4. I Get Along Without You - Joseph Gordon-Levitt

5. Dublin07 - Eve Hewson, Orén Kinlan

6. Juanita - Eve Hewson

7. Shopping Mall - Gary Clark

8. Welcome to L.A. - Joseph Gordon-Levitt

9. I’ll Be The One - Adam Hunter

10. Crumlin to L.A. - Jack Reynor, Gary Clark

11. Meet In The Middle - Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Eve Hewson

12. Rooftop - Gary Clark

13. Court - Gary Clark

14. Montage - Gary Clark, John Carney

15. Flora Watches Max - Gary Clark

16. High Life - Eve Hewson, Orén Kinlan

17. Talking To You - Joseph Gordon-Levitt
